# Welcome

This is a completely unofficial test of visualising race results for [TwinTowns Triathlon Club](http://www.twintownstriathlon.org.au). Have a look at the [December 5 example](#r-2020-12-05).

Only publicly available data from the [club's webscorer page](https://www.webscorer.com/33755) is used.
